\documentclass{standalone}
\usepackage{amsmath,quantikz}

\begin{document}
\begin{quantikz}
    & |[operator,inner sep=3pt]| & \midstick[4,brackets=none]{=} & \octrl{1} & \octrl{1} & \octrl{1} & \ \ldots \ & \ctrl{1} & \\
    & |[operator,inner sep=3pt]| & & \octrl{1} & \octrl{1} & \ctrl{1} & \ \ldots \ & \ctrl{1} & \\
    & |[operator,inner sep=3pt]| & & \octrl{1} & \ctrl{1} & \octrl{1} & \ \ldots \ & \ctrl{1} & \\
    & \gate{R_P}\wire[u][3]{q} & & \gate{R_P(\alpha_0)} & \gate{R_P(\alpha_1)} & \gate{R_P(\alpha_2)} & \ \ldots \ & \gate{R_P(\alpha_7)} &
\end{quantikz}
\end{document}
